Language: CSS

Technique

To identify discrepancies in placement of html elements you can add CSS outline property to make their contours visible as follows. 

div {
    outline: 1px solid blue;
}

Below is an example of using the property to see contours of <div> and <p> elements.

See the Pen Outline elements by Rustam (@rustam-isangulov) on CodePen.
